about_the_game:
Abyss Survivors – a casual game infused with horror and dark fantasy elements.

The once-pristine ocean has been corrupted by the abyss, turning its creatures into ferocious beasts. In this dire situation, harness your Sutando abilities to defeat them.

As you dive deeper, enemies grow stronger over time, but fear not! By defeating foes, you’ll level up and acquire more powerful weapons and gear. Additionally, use elemental reactions to create opportunities, and face bosses without hesitation.

Your Sutando will attack enemies on your behalf. It can move freely within the screen and utilize the abilities of acquired weapons in your place. While your Stand is powerful, don’t forget to protect your main body.

Fire Elemental Abnormality:
Inflicts continuous burning damage.
When encountering wind elements, it directly applies all burning damage.
Capable of sudden burst damage within a short timeframe.

Ice Elemental Abnormality:
Slows down enemies and replicates the highest damage dealt over a duration.
If an enemy takes significant damage while under the ice elemental abnormality, they’ll be quite unhappy!

Lightning Elemental Abnormality:
As the deadliest ocean element, it accumulates a charge.
When the charge reaches its maximum, it releases area-of-effect lightning damage.
The more targets affected, the higher the damage—imagine a beautiful lightning fireworks display when a group of enemies is together!

Wind Elemental Attacks:
High attack frequency.
Boost the fire elemental attack rate to trigger burst damage continuously.
While wind elements lean toward support abilities, their potential should not be underestimated.

Elemental Abnormalities Interaction:
The strength of an elemental abnormality depends on the abilities associated with its attribute.
When two identical elemental abnormalities interact, the highest value replaces the existing one.
For example, combining two fire elemental abnormalities (50% damage for 10 seconds and 100% damage for 5 seconds) results in a 100% damage effect lasting 10 seconds.
